headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, Deprecation, Sunset
headers.vary: Accept, Authorization, Cookie, X-GitHub-OTP, Accept-Encoding, Accept, X-Requested-With
headers.x-github-media-type: github.squirrel-girl-preview; format=json, github.inertia-preview; format=json, github.starfox-preview; format=json, github.mockingbird-preview; param=sailor-v-preview; format=json
headers.x-oauth-scopes: admin:enterprise, admin:gpg_key, admin:org, admin:org_hook, admin:public_key, admin:repo_hook, gist, repo, user, workflow, write:discussion, write:packages

data.title: Power App integration with GitHub - Walk Scenario for Approvals, deploying to production
data.body:
## Summary:
As part of enabling the pro developer audience to extend the applications built on the Power Platform with code, we need to offer a mature CI/CD story that meets the developers where they are – on GitHub. GitHub has recently added CI/CD capabilities to the platform with GitHub actions, templates and workflows and Microsoft’s continued investment in DevOps is firmly established as GitHub as opposed to Azure DevOps.  

**Walk Scenario:** Extensions to the GitHub Connector will enable DevOps leads & IT Admins to setup and manage the application lifecycle backing the application development by citizen developers at scale as well as creating self-serve apps using Power Apps and Power Automate. The GitHub connector will be able to trigger GitHub actions so workflows can be orchestrated using Power Automate Flows

## Features:
Enable maker to deploy an app to production
- [x] Create PR in GH for change details #371 
- [ ] Telemetry [ Power Apps & GitHub ] #396 
- [ ] Merging connectors to official GH connectors #282 
- [ ] PowerApps: Integration with official GitHub Actions #444 
- [x] Demo Feedback tracking #394
- [ ] Ignite Scenarios testing, config and release #386 
- [ ] PowerApps: Enhancements/Features #462 


Rest of the features are in #375
```
- [x] Spikes for PowerApps integration with GitHub #10 
Enable PowerApps GitHub Actions
- [x] PowerApps: Creating Wrapper (.Net code over ADO task Powershell scripts) For Export #333 
- [x] PowerApps: Creating Wrapper (.Net code over ADO task Powershell scripts) for Environments #330 
- [x] PowerApps: Creating Wrapper (.Net code over ADO task Powershell scripts) for Import #329 

Enable maker to request for a development environment
- [x] PowerApps: UX: PowerApp landing page #331 
- [x] PowerApps: UX: PowerApp Environment creation experience Feature #332
- [x] Creating DevEnv for Development #304 

Enable maker to submit an app for UAT
- [x] PowerApps: Trigger email notifications [ UAT, Approval, Deployment] #328 
- [x] Create Workflows and Build Artifact for UAT #379 
```

## EPD
Fill the EPD owners for this epic.
Engineering: @shailesh-sk 
Product: @ninallam 

## Partner Teams:
Power Platform Team
Per Mikkelsen
David Jenni

## Related Documents:
1. [Scenario Doc](https://microsoftapc.sharepoint.com/:w:/t/PowerApps-GitHub/ETBApNQmOXJMn8vYugWhSd0BypamrzBKyUwN18nI4-O_gw?e=675WUh)
2. [Mock screens](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/:p:/t/ReleaseManagement/RM/Eaf-TcyTYmxEoUExO5tmhfEBmHYyMnYlcx8mz9Bk-kUnPA?e=OrckMe)

## Success Criteria
1. By offering Native GitHub Actions for the Power Platform we will increase the quality of Applications in production and the velocity of implementation teams across SI’s, ISV’s and Enterprise Customers 
- 30% increase in automated vs. manual imports
- 30% Production Apps deployed as Managed Solution    
- No. of ICM’s caused by solution import issues down by 30%    
- 30% of ISV’s 100% source centric

2. GitHub Actions for the Power Platform will improve Pro developer NSAT 
-   >30% NPS

3. GitHub Actions for the Power Platform will make pro development for the Power Platform more attractive for Pro Developers 
- ISV & Pro-Dev Maker MAU > 30% YoY 

4. GitHub Actions for Power Platform with get more Pro-Developers to host PP solutions on GitHub 
-  No of repos consuming GitHub Actions for Power Platform 
- No of runs for GitHub actions for Power Platform

5. GitHub Actions for Power Platform with make GitHub more attractive for Pro-Developers for PP ALM 
-  No of Orgs consuming GitHub actions for Power Platform based on engagement level 

6. GitHub Actions for Power Platform will contribute to the bottom line of Power Platforms 
- No of Power Platform Subscriptions connected to GitHub 
- Power Platform connected revenue through GitHub 


## Checklist:
- [ ] Assign this issue to yourself/another individual
- [ ] Make sure 'Epic' label is added to the issue
- [ ] Link this Epic with an Initiative
- [ ] Link with the features
